I am a MASc candidate in CSAI at the University of Guelph advised by Dr. Graham Taylor where I am a member of the Machine Learning Research Group and the Vector Institute. My current research interests include deep learning, natural language processing, and genomics.

[/oxy_rich_text][oxy_rich_text ct_sign_sha256='002a0e619b420d7617ce3cde3731d80c8eaa599734c1eb3fa4323106101a71ee' ct_options='{"ct_id":2184,"ct_parent":2227,"selector":"_rich_text-2184-18","original":{"color":"#ffffff","font-size-unit":"em","font-size":"1.3","padding-top":"8","padding-left":"16","padding-right":"16","padding-bottom":"8"},"activeselector":false,"media":{"page-width":{"original":{}},"tablet":{"original":{"text-align":"left"}}}}']I graduated from the University of Toronto with an Honours Bachelor of Science, double major in Computer Science and Biology.
